SEARCH
Package com.codered.ecomerce.model

Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.codered.ecomerce.model.Product
public class Product extends Object
This class represents a product object in the e-commerce system. It contains methods to retrieve and update product information. It also contains methods to fetch variants of the product.
